# **Using AmericasBarometer data**

You will find in this web modules where AmericasBarometer data is used in R and RStudio. The analyses replicate results shown in several reports produced by LAPOP. These results give an outlook of how to use our data to produce statistical results.

# Topics

## Preparation

1.  [Installing R and RStudio](https://arturomaldonado.github.io/BarometroEdu_Web_Eng/install.html)

2.  [Basic procedures](https://arturomaldonado.github.io/BarometroEdu_Web_Eng/basic.html)

3.  [Importing datasets](https://arturomaldonado.github.io/BarometroEdu_Web_Eng/dataset.html)

## First steps
